person.persName: Thomas H. Carson (Owsley County, Kentucky lawyer and soldier, 8th Ky Inf (U.S. A.))

body.p: Booneville, Owsley County, Kentucky lawyer and soldier. Married to Sarah Evans Carson on July 20, 1847. Father of Isabella Carson, Asa Carson, Ann Carson, Thomas H. Carson, Nancy Carson, John Carson, David Carson and Stephen Carson. Occupation between 1850 and 1870 is lawyer in Owsley County. Served in the 8th Regiment Kentucky Infantry (U. S. A.), mustered in September 24, 1861 as sergeant, mustered out January 1864 as first lieutenant.
